desc: KAMARIA offers jewelry using opals, semi-precious gemstones, and lab-created gemstones. All necklaces, earrings, bracelets set in Sterling silver or 14kt gold. Every purchase supports survivors of power-inequality trauma to achieve their education. Use your power. Restore our dignity.

layout.text: Every purchase helps student survivors of power-inequality trauma with rent, medical, and tuition assistance through our non-profit,
